Britt Stegers

Eindhoven · Portfolio · brittstegers@gmail.com

I am Britt, a 23-year-old Dutch living in Eindhoven. I am an ex-top handball athlete, a survivor of chronic Lyme disease and a down-to-earth villager who likes to contribute to a more sustainable world. I am a loyal, enthusiastic, social, motivated and an accessible student who would like to get the most out of the studies and meanwhile enjoy it. In my spare time, I like to spend my time mountain biking, cycling, travelling and cooking.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
